text:
@realDonaldTrump YOU DONT care about the 80,00+ Americans DEAD from COVID19.  It means nothing to you! You don’t sleep because YOU worry about YOU!!!
HELL has a special place for you, your entire administration and all charlatans mascarading as CHRISTIANS calling themselves protectors of LIFE.
